title: Add static method to swap cores in CoreAdminRequest
description:
CoreAdminRequest provides handy static methods for common actions listed in CoreAdminAction:

	CoreAdminRequest.createCore()
	CoreAdminRequest.getStatus()
	CoreAdminRequest.mergeIndexes()
	CoreAdminRequest.reloadCore()
	CoreAdminRequest.renameCore()
	CoreAdminRequest.unloadCore()



However there is no method to swap cores using CoreAdminAction.SWAP. Maybe we could implement this and add a method CoreAdminRequest.swapCores() ?
